job description:
One of the world's largest banking and financial services groups is seeking a Data Scientist in New York.

Role:

Work with senior business staff and engineering teams to develop a surveillance platform
Implement a designed data strategy to support use cases across multi-vector analytical requirements
Leverage natural language processing and machine learning technologies to analyze available structured and unstructured information
Apply data mining techniques and use statistical analysis, algorithms and technical flags to create actionable insights
Develop software solutions for business requirements

Profile:

Master's degree in engineering, math, statistics, physics or technical field
Experience with Big data ecosystem (Hadoop, Solr, Elastic)
Experience implementing Big Data solutions
Experience with Statistical Analysis, Probabilistic Analysis and Data Visualization
Experience with Machine Learning and NLP
5+ years' experience developing software and using leading SQL databases (Oracle, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MySQL)
Strong NoSQL skills (Cassandra, CouchDB, MongoDB, HBase, MarkLogic)
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud)
Knowledge of Java/J2EE, JavaScript, JSON, Python, Perl, SQL, PL/SQL
Experience with front office staff is a strong advantage
Experience with trade surveillance (i.e. Actimize)
